basics.name: Johan Lindell
basics.summary: I'm a developer that has loved creating things digitally since the day he realized I could make my own website at the age of 12. Ever since then I've been into development. The first years I did exclusively web development but my interests and knowledge has been expanded a lot since then. Now I'm less than a year from my masters degree in computer science and the love for development is still there.

work.summary: As a system administrator at Linköpings University I and one other student was in charge of two computer labs with about 100 computers. The work involved configuration and maintenance of these computers. All computers was running Windows that was managed by an Active Directory server. We did also maintain a Linux server with web and email services.

This job was over the summer of 2012 where I created a platform for tracking customers through webshops and other websites. The platform did also make it possible for the user to rules to send the customers emails based on predefined criteria.

The work at KomTek involved creating a course for young children to make them interested in programming. The course was organized so that the children got a basic understanding of programming while still having fun in the process.

volunteer.summary: VilleValla is a student pub open for students of Linköpings University. I did both work at the bar as well as cooking the food. The most valuable lesson I learned while working at VilleValla was how to continue being engaged in the customers while still being under stress.
